STYLE.NAME: Fruit Cider
STYLE.NOTES: Cider made with other fruits or fruit juices added (pear, berry, etc). Entrants MUST specify carbonation level (still petillant or sparking), fruits used and sweetness (dry, medium)
STYLE.PROFILE: Substantial body. May contain tannins. Like a dry wine with complex flavors. Apple flavor must go well with other fruits. Clear to brilliant. Color as appropriate for fruit. No oxidation. Adjuncts should not dominate.
STYLE.INGREDIENTS: Apples with fruit or fruit juice added. Adjuncts should not dominate, but should blend well. High attenuation yeast.
